abstract: Whether you know who Monica Lewinsky is or not, you’ll probably know what she meant when she spoke about the dangers of online public shaming in a recent TED talk. Do you agree with her that our “culture of humiliation” has gotten out of hand? Why or why not?

headline.main: Is Our Culture of Online Shaming Out of Control?

snippet: Whether you know who Monica Lewinsky is or not, you’ll probably know what she meant when she spoke about the dangers of online public shaming in a recent TED talk. Do you agree with her that our “culture of humiliation” has gotten out of hand?...
